titles.title: A bill to amend section 1716E of title 18, United States Code, to clarify the application of the exception for the noncommercial mailing of tobacco products to members of the Armed Forces.
A bill to amend section 1716E of title 18, United States Code, to clarify the application of the exception for the noncommercial mailing of tobacco products to members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the federal criminal code, with respect to the noncommercial mailing of tobacco products to members of the Armed Forces, to exempt mailings of such products to members of the Armed Forces at a location outside the United States from certain weight, tracking, and minor verification requirements.
